title: Feel like royalty in our luxurious 2 BR / 2.5 BA! Call today!
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - The Park At East Ponce!', 'Address:', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Beds:', '2  /', 'Baths:', '2.5 /', 'Size:', '1337 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1591', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near The Park at East Ponce.", "You'll love living in the Stone Mountain location!", "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one and two bedroom floor plans.', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '− Business Center', '− Community Events', '− Controlled Access', '− Green Community', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Maintenance on site', '− Pet Care', '− Pets Allowed', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Swimming Pool', '− Electronic Rent Payment', '− Fax/Copy Services', '− Green and Flowered Areas', '− On-Site Maintenance', '− On-Site Management', '− Package Receiving', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Resident Referral Bonuses', '− Resort Style Swimming Pool', '− Three Clothes Care Centers', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Cozy Fireplaces', '− Dining Room', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Extra Storage', '− Island Kitchens', '− Range w/Oven', '− Air Conditioning', '− Custom Cabinetry', '− Hardwood Flooring', '− Individual Climate Control', '− Newly Renovated Apartments', '− Roommate Floor Plans', '− Townhomes Available', '− Trash Compactor', '− Washer & Dryer Connections', '− Window Coverings', 'Pets:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon -
